content.raw:
I'm getting a failing test: PhysicsEngines/LaserTest.LaserBox/1 when I test against bullet 2.82; I need to check if it's a problem for 2.81.
~~~
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/LaserTest.LaserBox/1
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.187
Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.09 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds

/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/test/integration/laser.cc:225: Failure
The difference between raySensor->GetRange(mid) and expectedRangeAtMidPoint is 0.032520152880762265, which exceeds 1e-5, where
raySensor->GetRange(mid) evaluates to 0.53252015288076227,
expectedRangeAtMidPoint evaluates to 0.5, and
1e-5 evaluates to 1.0000000000000001e-05.
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/test/integration/laser.cc:226: Failure
The difference between raySensor->GetRange(0) and expectedRangeAtMidPoint is 0.032513700277104096, which exceeds 1e-5, where
raySensor->GetRange(0) evaluates to 0.5325137002771041,
expectedRangeAtMidPoint evaluates to 0.5, and
1e-5 evaluates to 1.0000000000000001e-05.

Warning [World.cc:583] Calling World::Step(steps) while world is not paused
[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/LaserTest.LaserBox/1, where GetParam() = "bullet" (95647 ms)
~~~
